Description of incident: On April 2, 2012, an electronic file was discovered on Next Day Flyer's system.  The file was storing transaction information for customers who placed orders through the company's website between March 23, 2012 and April 2, 2012.  It was discovered when the company found out that an unauthorized person was trying to disrupt traffic to Next Day Flyer's website.  The file was removed, but customer names, credit card information, email addresses, and postal addresses may have been exposed.
